sentences.en: Children and adolescents may be particularly vulnerable to the deleterious effects of bias and stereotypes.
sentences.cn: 少年和青少年对于这样的偏见和愚昧的承受能力是特别的脆弱.

sentences.en: Exactly why the foreign body is so deleterious is not clear.
sentences.cn: 异物为什么如此有害,其确切原因尚不清楚.

sentences.en: Ferocious, deleterious traffic accidents inflict irrevocable damages to the eye.
sentences.cn: 摘要本篇报告二位外伤性眼球移位病患.

sentences.en: G 、 It is not contained the deleterious substance.
sentences.cn: 乳胶,作为医用科学方面的高级原料,对人体无害.

sentences.en: How mtDNA avoids the accumulation of deleterious mutations remains unknown.
sentences.cn: 线粒体DNA是如何避免有害突变的积累仍不清楚.

sentences.en: In normal seedlings the deleterious recessive genes are not expressed.
sentences.cn: 有害的隐性基因在正常菌木中不表现出来.

sentences.en: Is deleterious that a bosom healthy?
sentences.cn: 封胸有害于身体健康 么 ?

sentences.en: It exciudes deleterious substance, even if in heating or burning conditions.
sentences.cn: 即使在过热或燃烧的情形下,也不会发生有毒物资.

sentences.en: It exciudes the deleterious substance, even if in heating or burning conditions.
sentences.cn: 即使在过热或燃烧的情况下, 也不会产生有毒物质.

sentences.en: Petty crime is having a deleterious effect on community life.
sentences.cn: 轻微罪行正对社区生活产生有害影响。

sentences.en: Radioactive elements are at the normal background level, causing no deleterious pollution.
sentences.cn: 环境辐射在正常范围之内, 不存在任何人为造成的放射性污染.

sentences.en: Residue limits should be practical , achievable, verifiable, and based on the most deleterious residue.
sentences.cn: 残留物的限度切实可行的, 可检测的, 并由最有害的残留物来确定.

sentences.en: The cold weather had most deleterious consequences among the chrysanthemums.
sentences.cn: 寒冷的天气对菊花产生了极有害的影响.

sentences.en: The oxides of nitrogen can have deleterious effects on materials, vegetation, and animal and human life.
sentences.cn: 氮的氧化物对物质 、 植物 、 动物和人类生活有毒害效应.

sentences.en: This food be deleterious to health.

phrases.tran_cn: 毒害身心的作用，有毒影响
